title: Air Battle Royale: Sky Blitz
description: Air Battle Royale: Sky Blitz is an airplane shooting game where you take command of a heavily armed fighter jet. With just a single finger, you'll effortlessly soar through the skies, hunting down rivals and locking onto targets for intense dogfights. Win battles, earn rewards, and amp up your aircraft's speed and firepower or unlock even mightier planes. So, gear up, pilot â€“ ascend to the skies and reign supreme as the ultimate ace in this high-flying extravaganza!
